people.name: Jack
aka:
people.description: Slight build, wears glasses, elderly in nearly all photos, runner
people.relationships: Husband of Catherine, Father of Pat Martin, grandfather of Janeeta

people.name: Catherine
aka:
people.description: Stout build, elderly in nearly all photos
people.relationships: wife of Jack, mother of Pat Martin, grandmother of Janeeta

people.name: Pat
aka:
people.relationships: Son of Jack and Catherine, father of Janeeta, grandfather of Patricia, Keith, Duane

people.name: Jeanette
aka:
people.relationships: Wife of Pat Martin, mother of Janeeta, grandmother of Patricia, Keith, Duane, sister of Marguerite, sister-in-law of Mac

context: Start with these assumptions about people's identities if the visual evidence strongly supports it. Otherwise, describe generically. Jack, Catherine, Pat, Jeanette, Bill, Janeeta, Patricia, Keith, Duane, Clara, Boyd, Bruce, Bob are always keyworded. Martin, Kline, and Haugaard are surnames.
